com.panviva.util.pgc.rule

Class RuleSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panviva.util.pgc.rule.RuleSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRuleSet

    public class RuleSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRuleSet
    A container class that houses a list of rules and provides convenience methods to manage the rule set. The rules are added from the user supplied rules.xml template file and parsed by the RuleSetManager.
    Author:
    jcharles
